summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4159 for the improvement of Orcas Street, from 52nd Avenue South to Lake Washington Boulevard; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49698, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
